exit.description: To the north, the narrow hall runs further down.
exit.detailedDescription: The hall is dark, but sparse torches hang along the way.

exit.description: To the south, the narrow hall runs further down.
exit.detailedDescription: The hall is dark, but sparse torches hang along the way.

exit.description: To the west, a door hangs loosely on wooden hinges.
exit.detailedDescription: A voice is moaning pitifully within.

prop.description: The walls are re-enforced with wood beams.
prop.detailedDescription: They walls are wet and soft, made of pressed mud.

prop.description: A girl lies quivering in the mud.
prop.detailedDescription:
The clothes on her back are split as is the flesh beneath them. She speaks, "Get that whip out of here. When you take an item, you can see it in your inventroy. It's odd, but items are often amoung the last things you see in a room."
You learned the inventory command! Type "inventory" and hit ENTER.

item.description: On the wall near the entrance, hangs a whip.
item.detailedDescription: The whip is frayed at the end and dripping with blood.
